title: More Music, or More From Music
preview: Streaming music services have brought about unprecendented convenience of accessing music, but I feel I derive less and less joy and value from listening to music than I used to.

title: Brian Eno. What does he know?
preview: From one of the most influential and multi-talented artists of our time -- Brian Eno, what can we learn about creative thinking?

title: Remembering David Bowie From A China Girl
preview: Upon the sudden passing of David Bowie, I look back on the inspiring experience of discovering his work, and realize his influence on me way beyond music. His legendary life has given me an answer of what it means to be a true creative for life.

title: Navigating the Mess
preview: The experience of learning design and HCI at Stanford can be extremely exciting and also sometimes puzzling. Looking back, I finally start to see how all the dots are connected.
